title: Max Watchface free
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37-A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: Max watchface as the name tells the story is a fully optimized watch face for your smart watch. It is a blend of a classy and a techy watch style. With a sleek leather texture in the background and dials in foreground makes it irresistible to not to look at.Maximize your watch feature as you can get everything in this free watch face. It displays time in both digital and analogue style for easy readability with a circulating seconds bar and digital display of date. Frillroid Watch Faces focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.Key custom features:-• Display both analogue and digital clock.• Elegant and leather design.• Clean and simplistic look with cool combo• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everThis watch face is for round/circular smart watches such as the Motorola Moto 360, LG G WATCH R and LG watch Urbane. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.How it works?Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. There is a possibility of getting delay while setting the watch face to your android wear, patience are recommended. This is not caused by the watch face, but rather Android Wear app. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
descriptionHTML:
Max watchface as the name tells the story is a fully optimized watch face for your smart watch. It is a blend of a classy and a techy watch style. With a sleek leather texture in the background and dials in foreground makes it irresistible to not to look at.
Maximize your watch feature as you can get everything in this free watch face. It displays time in both digital and analogue style for easy readability with a circulating seconds bar and digital display of date.
Frillroid Watch Faces focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.
Key custom features:-

• Display both analogue and digital clock.
• Elegant and leather design.
• Clean and simplistic look with cool combo
• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever
This watch face is for round/circular smart watches such as the Motorola Moto 360, LG G WATCH R and LG watch Urbane. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.

How it works?
Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. There is a possibility of getting delay while setting the watch face to your android wear, patience are recommended. This is not caused by the watch face, but rather Android Wear app. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
comments: Waste of time It wants you to purchase it to change the settings
Too bland Bland and default icons aren't useful or changeable.
No sync I love the face but it will not sync after changing color.
